author: MohitS704
body:
Hello,

Hopefully this is the last time we need to do this! 

We need this for 2024 production of Monte-Carlo, so we are backporting it from CMSSW_14_1_X. The latest backport was in March, here: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47310, alongside the other ports here: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45344, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46856, and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47057.
title: Backporting MCMultiParticleMassFilter for 2024 Production
